AccessObj.Description: This function allows evaluating any formula in the context of a UI object, which is specified by a Definition type and Access Name

Parameters.Keywords: Border, Button, Collection, Color, Colour, COM Interface, Field, Form, Function, Import File, Import Object, Include, Key, Key Value Map, Line, Menu, Name Set, Object, Object Map, Part, Progress Bar, QueryBox, Report, Resource, Rule Set, Style, System, Table, Variable

AccessObj.Name: AccessObj

AsFlagSet.Description: This function converts a given Num Set into a Flag Set.
AsFlagSet.Name: AsFlagSet

AsNumSet.Description: This function converts a given Flag Set into a Num Set.
AsNumSet.Name: AsNumSet

AsReqObj.Description: This Function overrides the default requestor and bookmarks the current object as Requestor Object for referring later during the subsequent evaluation when referred using ReqObject Function.  When ReqObject Function is used, the same evaluates the parameter in the context of this Object context that is bookmarked as a Requestor.
AsReqObj.Name: AsReqObj

BaseOwner.Description: This function gives/checks the Base Owner (i.e., Object) of the associated method. When prefixed to an expression in TDL, the Current Object changes to the base owner object, for the purpose of evaluation of the expression. The Expression can be any Valid TDL Expression which may consist of method, function etc.
BaseOwner.Name: BaseOwner

CanCancel.Description: This function checks whether the current object can be cancelled or not.
CanCancel.Name: CanCancel

CanDelete.Description: This function checks whether the current object can be deleted or not.
CanDelete.Name: CanDelete

CollAmtTotal.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type Amount from all the Objects of the specified Collection.
CollAmtTotal.Name: CollAmtTotal

CollAmtTotalEx.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type Amount from all the Objects of the specified Collection.
CollAmtTotalEx.Name: CollAmtTotalEx

CollectionField.Description: This function returns the value of a method at a particular position of the given collection.
CollectionField.Name: CollectionField

CollectionFieldByKey.Description: The function enables the TDL Programmer to create *in-memory indexed collections* based on some 'Search Key'. This indexed collection will have significant performance improvement.
CollectionFieldByKey.Name: CollectionFieldByKey

CollNumTotal.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type Number from all the Objects of the specified Collection.
CollNumTotal.Name: CollNumTotal

CollNumTotalEx.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type Number from all the Objects of the specified Collection.
CollNumTotalEx.Name: CollNumTotalEx

CollQtyTotal.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type Quantity from all the Objects of the specified Collection.
CollQtyTotal.Name: CollQtyTotal

CollQtyTotalEx.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type Quantity from all the Objects of the specified Collection.
CollQtyTotalEx.Name: CollQtyTotalEx

CollSrcObj.Description: This function evaluates the given expression in context of an object of the source collection from which a Walk is being evaluated.
CollSrcObj.Name: CollSrcObj

EvaluateRuleSet.Description: This function evaluates a Rule Set in the current context and returns the result as a Flag Set.
EvaluateRuleSet.Name: EvaluateRuleSet

FilterAmtTotal.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type  Amount from all the Objects of a specified collection satisfying the given filter expression.
FilterAmtTotal.Name: FilterAmtTotal

FilterAmtTotalEx.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type  Amount from all the Objects of a specified collection satisfying the given filter expression.
FilterAmtTotalEx.Name: FilterAmtTotalEx

FilterCount.Description: This function returns the count of the objects in a Collection that has passed the filter.
FilterCount.Name: FilterCount

FilterCountEx.Description: This function returns the count of the objects in a Collection that has passed the filter.
FilterCountEx.Name: FilterCountEx

FilterNumTotal.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type  Number from all the Objects of a specified collection satisfying the given filter expression.
FilterNumTotal.Name: FilterNumTotal

FilterNumTotalEx.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type  Number from all the Objects of a specified collection satisfying the given filter expression.
FilterNumTotalEx.Name: FilterNumTotalEx

FilterQtyTotal.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type  Quantity from all the Objects of a specified collection satisfying the given filter expression.
FilterQtyTotal.Name: FilterQtyTotal

FilterQtyTotalEx.Description: This function returns the sum of the required Method of Type  Quantity from all the Objects of a specified collection satisfying the given filter expression.
FilterQtyTotalEx.Name: FilterQtyTotalEx

FilterValue.Description: This function returns the value of a method at a particular position of the resultant collection which satisfies the given filter expression.
FilterValue.Name: FilterValue

FirstObj.Description: This function evaluates the given parameter in the context of the first object in the Collection.
FirstObj.Name: FirstObj

FlagGetDescription.Description: This function returns the description string associated with a given flag or rule in a Rule Set.
FlagGetDescription.Name: FlagGetDescription

FlagGetValue.Description: This function returns the logical value of a flag in a Flag Set.
FlagGetValue.Name: FlagGetValue

FlagsCount.Description: This function returns count of flags in a given level that match the value passed.
FlagsCount.Name: FlagsCount

FlagsCountFromLevel.Description: This function returns count of flags in a given level across parents that match the value passed.
FlagsCountFromLevel.Name: FlagsCountFromLevel

FlagSetAND.Description: This function performs an AND operation of two flag sets specified.
FlagSetAND.Name: FlagSetAND

FlagSetOR.Description: This function performs an OR operation of the two flag sets specified.
FlagSetOR.Name: FlagSetOR

FlagsIsAllTrue.Description: This function returns True if all the child rules (rules of next dimension) of a given rule are True.
FlagsIsAllTrue.Name: FlagsIsAllTrue

FlagsIsAllTrueFromLevel.Description: This function returns True if all the rules at a specified level across parent rules are True.
FlagsIsAllTrueFromLevel.Name: FlagsIsAllTrueFromLevel

FlagsIsAnyTrue.Description: This function returns True if any of the child rules (rules of next dimension) of a given rule are True.
FlagsIsAnyTrue.Name: FlagsIsAnyTrue

FlagsIsAnyTrueFromLevel.Description: This function returns True if any of the rules at a specified level across parent rules are True.
FlagsIsAnyTrueFromLevel.Name: FlagsIsAnyTrueFromLevel

FlagsListDescription.Description: This function returns a string that contains the descriptions of the immediate child rules for the parent rule identifier. The strings are separated by the separator character.
FlagsListDescription.Name: FlagsListDescription

FlagsListDescriptionFromLevel.Description: This function returns a string that contains the descriptions of all rules at the level specified by the rule identifier (across parents). The strings are separated by the separator character. Duplicate descriptions are automatically ignored and only unique ones are taken.
FlagsListDescriptionFromLevel.Name: FlagsListDescriptionFromLevel

IsCollSrcObjChanged.Description: This function returns TRUE if Source object is changed during a depth walk. Can be used to identify that we are still in depth walk of same source object
IsCollSrcObjChanged.Name: IsCollSrcObjChanged

IsEmptyCollection.Description: This function returns TRUE if the given collection is empty else returns FALSE.
IsEmptyCollection.Name: IsEmptyCollection

IsFirstObj.Description: This function returns TRUE if the current object is the first Object in the Collection else returns FALSE.
IsFirstObj.Name: IsFirstObj

IsLastObj.Description: This function returns TRUE if the current object is the last Object in the Collection else returns FALSE.
IsLastObj.Name: IsLastObj

IsRemoved.Description: This function returns TRUE if the current object is marked as removed in the Collection else returns FALSE.
IsRemoved.Name: IsRemoved

ItemSerial.Description: This function helps to auto generate Line Numbers starting from 0. It does not accept any parameter and returns Numerical value. It differs from other such function by its starting number i.e. 0.
ItemSerial.Name: ItemSerial

LastObj.Description: This function evaluates the given parameter in the context of the last object in the Collection.
LastObj.Name: LastObj

LineObject.Description: This function evaluates the given parameter in the context of the Object associated at the Line Level.
LineObject.Name: LineObject

LoopCollObj.Description: This function is used to retrieve the value of a method/ field of the current object in the loop collection.
LoopCollObj.Name: LoopCollObj

Name.Description: This function returns the current object name.
Name.Name: Name

NameGetValue.Description: This function returns the string value for a given Name Set and Name Identity.
NameGetValue.Name: NameGetValue

NextObj.Description: This function evaluates the given parameter in the context of the next/subsequent object in the Collection.
NextObj.Name: NextObj

NumFilledItems.Description: This function is used to identify the number of non empty objects in a given collection. For example, if there are 5 Ledgers created in a company and entries are made for only 3 ledgers, $$NumFilledItems of Ledger Collection returns 3.
NumFilledItems.Name: NumFilledItems

NumGetValue.Description: This function returns the integer value of an element in a Num Set.
NumGetValue.Name: NumGetValue

NumItems.Description: This function returns the count of Objects present in the given collection.
NumItems.Name: NumItems

ObjBudget.Description: This function returns the 'Budget' Object Parameter in the current context.
ObjBudget.Name: ObjBudget

ObjCompany.Description: Returns the 'Company' Object Parameter in the current context
ObjCompany.Name: ObjCompany

ObjectOf.Description: This function allows evaluating any formula in the context of the data object associated with a UI object, that is specified by a Definition type and Access Name.

Parameters.Keywords: Border, Button, Collection, Color, Colour, COM Interface, Field, Form, Function, Import File, Import Object, Include, Key, Key Value Map, Line, Menu, Name Set, Object, Object Map, Part, Progress Bar, QueryBox, Report, Resource, Rule Set, Style, System, Table, Variable

ObjectOf.Name: ObjectOf

ObjFromDate.Description: This function returns the 'From date' Object Parameter in the current context.
ObjFromDate.Name: ObjFromDate

ObjScenario.Description: This function returns the 'Scenario' Object Parameter in the current context.
ObjScenario.Name: ObjScenario

ObjToDate.Description: This function returns the 'To Date' Object Parameter in the current context.
ObjToDate.Name: ObjToDate

ObjValMethod.Description: This function returns the 'Valuation Method' Object Parameter in the current context.
ObjValMethod.Name: ObjValMethod

Owner.Description: This function evaluates the given parameter in the context of the owner object.
Owner.Name: Owner

PartNumber.Description: This function fetches the Part number of a stock item.
PartNumber.Name: PartNumber

PrevObj.Description: This function evaluates the given parameter in the context of the previous object in the Collection.
PrevObj.Name: PrevObj

ReportObject.Description: This function evaluates the given parameter in the context of the Object associated at the Report Level.
ReportObject.Name: ReportObject

ReptField.Description: This function extracts the value of the method at a specified line number within the collection wherein the method to be retrieved must be a repeated method such as Address.
ReptField.Name: ReptField

ReqObject.Description: This function evaluates the given expressions in the context of the Requestor Data Object.
ReqObject.Name: ReqObject

ReqOwner.Description: This function evaluates the given expressions in the context of the Requestor Interface Object.
ReqOwner.Name: ReqOwner

SetAutoColumns.Description: This function which needs to be triggered at the Form level with a Dummy option enables the current report to contain multiple columns depending upon the parameters passed.
SetAutoColumns.Name: SetAutoColumns

Type.Description: This function returns the current Object Type.
Type.Name: Type
